HealthPoints.label: Hull Points
HealthPoints.hint: Indicates how much damage the hull can withstand

ShieldsPoints.label: Shield Points
ShieldsPoints.hint: Indicates how much damage the shields can withstand

Speed.label: Speed
Speed.hint: Indicates the speed of the ship

CargoCapacity.label: Cargo Capacity
CargoCapacity.hint: Indicates the maximum amount of cargo the ship can hold

MaxComponents.label: Max Components
MaxComponents.hint: Indicates the maximum amount of components the ship can hold

UsedComponents.label: Used Components
UsedComponents.hint: Indicates the amount of components the ship has installed

Skills.label: Skills
Skills.hint: List of skills the character has mastered

Max.label: Skill Slot Limit
Max.hint: Indicates the maximum number of skills the character can master

Used.label: Used Skill Slots
Used.hint: Indicates the number of skills the character has already mastered
